subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, playing hours after learning about the death of his grandfather, beat Alexandr Dolgopolov, 2-6, 6-1, 6-4, to reach the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, playing hours after learning about the death of his grandfather, beat Alexandr Dolgopolov, 2-6, 6-1, 6-4, to reach the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals.
